channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1513691019677958145
item.description: For the 1st time, we’ve published satellite imagery for some of Aotearoa’s most remote islands, incl. Snares Islands / Tini Heke, Kermadec Islands and Campbell Island / Motu Ihupuku. Available at https://t.co/3PSbzuWnxe & https://t.co/qodmL5eSer (Image: Raoul Island) #OpenData https://t.co/QBT7HZaJF3

item.title: #en @ 1513619423080316930
item.description: New paper, with accompanying open data (200 physiologic time series with ECG and impedance cardiography): "Unsupervised clustering of autonomic temporal networks in clinically distressed and psychologically healthy individuals." 1/6 https://t.co/AdeXzvfitO

item.title: #de @ 1513507663602229248
item.description: Emotionale #OpenData Achterbahn. Datensatz: Verkehrszählung🤩. In SHP, KML & GEOJSON 🥰. Nur Zählstandorte, Zählungen für jeden Standort als individuelle ZIP-Downloads 😕. In den ZIPs dann PDFs 🤯.

item.description: Hae was, gerade These gehoert: Die Einfuehrung der E-Akte ist _notwendige_ Voraussetzung fuer die automatisierte Bereitstellung von Open Data?! Also ich verstehe den Gedanken, aber das ist schon ein wenig… kurz gedacht?

#DYK?

item.title: #en @ 1513445132153995268
item.description:
Open data as a ‘digital public good’ has a variety of uses — from improving urban mobility to protecting biodiversity.
Yet, only 8% of datasets essential for innovation are #OpenData 📊
➡️ Learn more in our latest Bulletin: https://t.co/ZqBSrP4OHr https://t.co/uhbjRN7lMw

item.title: #en @ 1513433012629049346
item.description: @deluisa_maybe @TimStrutzi @dominicstucki @Lenny_du_Nord @_wrzlbrnft_ And also - thinking further. The Swiss public transport system is often held up in Germany as an example to emulate. But many in the rail industry in Germany are *against* mandated open data... Do they even know what Switzerland does?

item.title: #fi @ 1513431919010193410
item.description:
Osa suomalaisista ja #Suomi🇫🇮-päättäjistä uskoo yhä vastoin kansainvälisen tieteen tutkimustuloksia, että koronan saaminen on turvallista lähes kaikille.
#VakuutusLaitos #OP, ei kuitenkaan perusta päätöksiään kansallismutuun, vaan kansainväliseen tutkittuun dataan. #OpenData🌍 https://t.co/FRJ8EO4C78

item.title: #en @ 1513431790752567298
item.description: @jonworth @TimStrutzi @dominicstucki @Lenny_du_Nord @_wrzlbrnft_ One of the few examples of good Data Governance in the transit sector… All public transit concessionaires are mandated by the Swiss Government to supply their data into a single Open Data Platform. DB just feeds Hafas this convenient and open set of data. Same for Apple & Google

item.title: #ja @ 1513426259396550659
item.description: この記事の元になったのは、警察庁のオープンデータです。とってもキレイで扱いやすいCSVファイルとして公開されています。こうしたデータをまとめて公開した警察庁はすばらしい。同様の取り組みが続けばいいなと期待します。https://t.co/57ykZvy5i3 https://t.co/QMf7yIbAm0

item.title: #en @ 1513412606614196227
item.description: It's Monday, here comes my unpopular opinion. We need #OpenScience, we need #OpenData, we need to reform research and its assessment. Do we need yet another Nature editorial or piece or whatever to tell us that? I don't think so.

item.title: #en @ 1513396484485652484
item.description: Do you have questions about #OpenScience, #OpenData, #ResearchDataManagement or #OpenAccess? For more detailed information visit: https://t.co/zKefcM7Pe7 https://t.co/7AN74kPAdw

item.title: #es @ 1513318972871032835
item.description:
#LOULTIMO 🇵🇪 🙏En el Perú: Tras 105 semanas, desde el 02/04/2020, se registran las cifras más bajas de muertes por #COVID19 a nivel nacional.
#TomeNota Hoy 10/04 MINSA reportará "parcialmente" 5 muertes con respecto al 09/04
Fuente: #DatosAbiertos vía SINADEF https://t.co/G6aal8mQvg

item.title: #es @ 1513313963022430210
item.description: #ACTUALIZACIÓN 🇵🇪 El 06/04 MINSA había reportado CERO fallecidos por #COVID19 en Lima Metropolitana con respecto al día 05/04. Tras 4 días se corrobora que la cifra se ha actualizado a TRES fallecidos en tal día según #DatosAbiertos por fecha de defunción. https://t.co/BBUG0v54CE https://t.co/BKsaANDCGI https://t.co/Nh9xxunZ0c

item.title: #en @ 1513262696602472463
item.description: Request from a friend: Can someone give an example of where the availability open data in health/medical research resulted in better results (e.g., discovery of an honest mistake by the original researchers)?

item.title: #es @ 1513256814875348993
item.description:
...los informes sobre casos y muertes por COVID-19 del personal de salud no se han actualizado desde el 25 de octubre de 2021 (hace más de 5 meses) y seguimos sin contar con datos abiertos de la vacunación en México.
La pandemia no ha terminado y vamos más a ciegas que nunca. 👇🏼 https://t.co/jx8cThChbl

item.description: Interesting viewpoint. Unfortunately, a lot of scientific data (especially from big data fields) doesn't get shared; because the systems to incentivize data sharing are insufficient. Is it "time to recognize authorship of open data?" #AcademicChatter https://t.co/PWm3OhkAUO
